text: Anastasia "Tasoula" Kelesidou (, , born 28 November 1972 in Hamburg, Germany) is a retired Greek discus thrower best known for winning silver medals at the 2000 and 2004 Summer Olympics. During her career she set seven Greek records in discus throw, the best being 67.70 metres.Anastasia Kelesidou. Sports Reference. Retrieved on 2015-01-08.
